channel.title: Mediagazer
channel.description: Top news and commentary for media professionals from all around the web

item.title: アマゾンは、ここ数カ月の間にAIが作成した疑いのある書籍が大量に出品されたことを受け、著者のウェブサイトでの自費出版を1日3冊に制限している（Ella Creamer/The Guardian）。
item.description:
Ella Creamer / The Guardian:
Amazon limits authors to self-publishing three books per day on its website, after an influx of suspected AI-generated material listed for sale in recent months  —  The company announced the new limitations after an influx of suspected AI-generated material was listed for sale but said that ‘very few’ publishers will be affected

item.title: ルパート・マードックの会社所有の仕組みは、ラクランの昇格が必ずしも一族帝国の支配権争いの終結を意味しない（マシュー・ガラハン/フィナンシャル・タイムズ紙）
item.description:
Matthew Garrahan / Financial Times:
The way Rupert Murdoch structured the ownership of his companies doesn't necessarily mean Lachlan's ascension ends the fight for control of the family empire  —  The way outgoing patriarch Rupert has structured ownership of his assets means the story is not yet over

item.title: AIツールは、大規模なデータファイルのクエリ、潜在的な記事に関するアラート、コンテンツのパーソナライズなどのタスクで、記者、報道機関、読者を支援することができる（Louise Story）。
item.description:
Louise Story:
AI tools can help reporters, news outlets, and readers with tasks such as querying large data files, alerting about potential stories, and personalizing content  —  Today, understanding artificial intelligence is an essential skill for a media leader.  This is not simply because you need …

item.title: 欧州の出版社60社の割引購読戦略を見てみよう。消費者に定期的な読書習慣をつけるため、出版社はより長いトライアルを試みている（Aisha Majid/Press Gazette）
item.description:
Aisha Majid / Press Gazette:
A look at the discounted subscription strategies at 60 publishers in Europe, as publishers try longer trials to build regular reading habits among consumers  —  Consumers have come to expect discounted trials and introductory offers when signing up to news brands.

item.title: クリストファー・ベハがハーパーズ誌編集長を辞任、2018年にシニアエディターとしてハーパーズに加わったクリストファー・キャロルが9月25日付で編集長に就任する（Max Tani/@maxwelltani）
item.description:
Max Tani / @maxwelltani:
Christopher Beha resigns as editor of Harper's Magazine; Christopher Carroll, who joined Harper's as senior editor in 2018, will become editor on September 25  —  Inbox: Christopher Beha Resigns from Harper's Magazine; Christopher Carroll Appointed Editor [image]

item.title: スナップによると、Snapchat+の加入者数は2023年4月の3Mから5M以上に増加、月額3.99ドルの層は広告収入の業界減速後、2022年6月に開始（Alex Barinka/Bloomberg）
item.description:
Alex Barinka / Bloomberg:
Snap says Snapchat+ now has 5M+ subscribers, up from 3M in April 2023; the $3.99 per month tier launched in June 2022, after an industry slowdown in ad revenue  —  Snap Inc. has gained more than 5 million subscribers for its paid service, an offering that gives users early access to new features …

item.title: YouTube、クリエイターが動画を編集し、エフェクトやGIF、ロイヤリティフリーのトラックなどを追加できるアプリ「YouTube Create」を8市場のAndroidでベータ公開（Sarah Perez/TechCrunch）
item.description:
Sarah Perez / TechCrunch:
YouTube debuts YouTube Create, an app that lets creators edit videos, adding effects, GIFs, royalty-free tracks, and more, in beta on Android in eight markets  —  YouTube this morning introduced a new app for creators, YouTube Create, that will offer a suite of easy-to-use and free tools …

item.title: YouTube、2024年登場の「YouTube Studio」AI機能を発表、AIが他言語の吹き替えを作成する「Aloud」を一部のクリエイターにテストさせる（Sarah Perez/TechCrunch）
item.description:
Sarah Perez / TechCrunch:
YouTube unveils YouTube Studio AI features coming in 2024 and lets select creators test Aloud, a dubbing tool that creates AI-generated dubs in other languages  —  YouTube is expanding its Creator Music Studio, announced last year, with new AI features in addition to the launch of an AI-dubbing tool.

item.title: YouTube、テキストプロンプトを使ってAIが生成した動画や画像の背景を作成できるShorts機能「Dream Screen」を発表、2024年初頭にロールアウト（Sarah Perez/TechCrunch）
item.description:
Sarah Perez / TechCrunch:
YouTube announces Dream Screen, a Shorts feature that lets users create an AI-generated video or image background using text prompts, rolling out in early 2024  —  YouTube today announced a new feature coming to its short-form video platform Shorts that will allow users to leverage AI tools to create videos.

item.title: 情報源Deezer、欧州数カ国で月額サブスクリプションを11ユーロから12ユーロに値上げ予定。
item.description:
Anna Nicolaou / Financial Times:
Sources: Deezer plans to increase its monthly subscription from €11 to €12 for several countries in Europe; Deezer was the first to raise prices in early 2022  —  Move comes as industry increases fees and era of cheap entertainment comes to an end

item.title: WWEの "SmackDown "が2024年秋にFoxからNBCUniversalのUSAネットワークに移籍する計画。情報筋によると、5年契約の評価額は～14億ドルで、Foxが支払った額より～40％アップするとのこと（Joe Flint/Wall Street Journal）
item.description:
Joe Flint / Wall Street Journal:
WWE's “SmackDown” plans to move from Fox to NBCUniversal's USA Network in fall 2024; sources: the five-year deal is valued at ~$1.4B, up ~40% from what Fox paid  —  Premier WWE television-rights package to get a new home next fall  —  NBCUniversal's USA Network has pinned down the rights for “SmackDown,” the

item.title: ルパート・マードック氏がフォックス社およびニューズ社の会長から名誉会長に就任、ラクラン・マードック氏は両社の単独会長に（David Rutz/Fox News）
item.description:
David Rutz / Fox News:
Rupert Murdoch transitions from chair of Fox Corp and News Corp to the new role of Chairman Emeritus; Lachlan Murdoch becomes the sole chair of both companies  —  ‘For my entire professional life, I have been engaged daily with news and ideas, and that will not change’

item.title: パラマウントがCBS Sports Creator Studioを立ち上げ、CBS Sportsのイベントや番組の舞台裏に潜入するクリエイターと広告主をペアにする計画（Alex Weprin/The Hollywood Reporter）
item.description:
Alex Weprin / The Hollywood Reporter:
Paramount launches the CBS Sports Creator Studio, which plans to pair advertisers with creators who would go behind the scenes at CBS Sports events or programs  —  The company is launching the CBS Sports Creator Studio, hoping to pair influencers with talent, or give them behind-the-scenes access in support of deals.

item.title: 日本の放送局である日本テレビがスタジオジブリの株式を取得し、宮崎駿が共同設立した日本のアニメ会社を子会社として存続させる計画（Patrick Frater/Variety）
item.description:
Patrick Frater / Variety:
Japanese broadcaster NTV acquires a controlling stake in Studio Ghibli and plans to keep the Japanese anime company co-founded by Miyazaki Hayao as a subsidiary  —  The companies said that Studio Ghibli will become a “subsidiary.”  —  Nippon Television is to buy shares in Studio Ghibli …

item.title: Scale AIやAppenのようなデータ・ラベリング企業は、AIライティング・ツールの文学的な質を向上させるために、人文科学のバックグラウンドを持つ詩人や作家を雇っている（Andrew Deck/Rest of World）
item.description:
Andrew Deck / Rest of World:
Data-labeling firms like Scale AI and Appen are hiring poets and writers with humanities backgrounds to improve the literary quality of their AI writing tools  —  Training data companies are grabbing writers of fiction, drama, poetry, and also general humanities experts to improve AI creative writing.
